posts.post_title: Wts: T206 ty cobb red portrait ex condition only $850! **sold**
posts.post_content: Card is well centered, sweet cap 350-460 back. Card has exceptional color but has a horizontal crease just below cobb's collar. Back is extra clean. Card is a strong ex except for the crease. Priced at $850.  Detailed scans available,  just send me your email. Thanks  **SOLD**
